name: Plus Puzzle
description:
Hello there! So this is my first time that I made my games on Pocket Code. This game is like plus and I made myself, No copyright. No virus, free download and it is only on Android. This game is very simple for beginner. It has only 4 move control which was up, down, left and right. Up and down are only in a vertical row while the left and right are only in a horizontal row. This was the first puzzle ever exist and It was made by me Pocket Code. Hope you play this game by downloading this and pressing this link below. You can download my games without pocket code! 😉

Plus Puzzle by me (Pocket Code) APK
